import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-login', templateUrl: './login.component.html', styleUrls: ['./login.component.css'] }) export class LoginComponent { cadastrar(): void{ window.alert('olá'); (document.getElementById('divCadastro') as HTMLElement).style.display = 'none'; } }
